title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 381/87 of 6 February 1987 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1694/86 laying down detailed implementing rules for the granting of a calf birth premium
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 381/87
of 6 February 1987
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1694/86 laying down detailed implementing rules for the granting of a calf birth premium
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the first indent Article 1 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 1694/86, '31 December 1986' shall be replaced by '5 April 1987'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publications in the Official Journal of the European Communities. It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 February 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
